shr Reference Model Version 1.0.0
icare

Group Review

Documentation:

Documentation of a re-assessment of the Care Plan, which may or may not lead to a revision of the plan. The fact the assessment has been conducted should be documented even when the Care Plan is not changed.

Implementation note: A ReasonCode is required when Changed value is TRUE.

Ancestors:
  • Review
Used By:
  • CarePlanWithReview

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      ReviewedBy

      The practitioner who is the reviewer. If not provided, it is assumed the author of the Care Plan was the reviewer.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ReviewedBy
      0..1
      ReviewedDate

      The most recent date the item was reviewed.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ReviewedDate
      1..1
      Changed

      A flag indicating whether a change was made to the Care Plan at the time of the review.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Changed
      1..1
      ReasonCode

      The explanation or justification for the current item or action, as a code. Reason is a string or CodeableConcept in DSTU2 but in later versions only a CodeableConcept.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      ReasonCode
      0..1
      http://standardhealthrecord.org/shr/ValueSet/obf-CarePlanChangeReasonVS (EXTENSIBLE)
      CommentOrDescription

      A text note containing additional details, explanation, description, comment, or summarization.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CommentOrDescription
      0..1
